title: Different World Reincarnation as a Sage ~With my Gaming Knowledge, I’ll become the World’s Strongest~ (LN) - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Fantasy   Harem   Romance   Shounen
tags: Adapted to Manga   Aristocracy   Caring Protagonist   Cheats   Clever Protagonist   Evil Organizations   Fantasy World   Game Elements   Genius Protagonist   Kind Love Interests   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Magic   Male Protagonist   Medical Knowledge   Modern Knowledge   Nobles   Overpowered Protagonist   Poor to Rich   Reincarnated in a Game World   Sword And Magic   Weak to Strong
author: Shinkou Shotou   進行諸島
description:
A boy, born to a noble family, led a tragic life and in the end, met a tragic death. The next time he opened his eyes, he was in a world that resembled a VRMMO he played in his dreams. The inhabitants were ignorant even to the most basic concepts — concepts that would be considered common knowledge in a game — and kept on fighting inefficiently.

In this world, our protagonist, armed with his game knowledge, acquires the strongest job class there is –the Sage — and proceeds to become the world’s strongest.>
